question:
At which of the following places Stone sculptures of the Pala school are found?
1) Nalanda,
2) Rajagriha,
3) Bodh Gaya
4) Raj Shahi
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: During the medieval period, Nalanda was the greatest center of the eastern school of sculpture during the 9th and 10th centuries. Stone sculptures of the Pala school are found at Nalanda, Rajagriha, Bodh Gaya, Raj Shahi and Khichanga in Mayurbhanj.
